hero.badge: ✨ Smart Inventory & POS for Growing Businesses
hero.title: Know your stock. Grow your sales.
hero.description: mBiz is built for small and medium enterprises that want real control over their business — without the complexity or cost of enterprise software.

features.title: Real Control for Growing Businesses
features.description: mBiz replaces complexity with clarity, helping you run your business efficiently from day one.
features.stop_theft_desc: Full audit trails, barcode scanner integration, and role-based access to make theft hard to hide.
features.sell_online_desc: Activate your own branded shop and marketplace listing with a single toggle. No extra fees.
features.monitor_desc: Real-time revenue, top products, and staff performance visible from your phone, anywhere.
features.save_time_desc: Replace slow, manual processes with barcode scanning, automated reporting, and digital receipts.
features.customer_mgmt_desc: Track purchase history, credit balances with due dates, and contact customers directly via WhatsApp.
features.secure_multi_desc: Role-based access, 2FA, and subdomain isolation for unlimited branches under one account.

pricing.title: Pricing per Branch
pricing.description: mBiz is priced per branch, not per user. Add as many staff as your business needs — you only pay for the locations you run.

benefits.title: Who Is mBiz For?
benefits.description: Versatile enough for any SME, specialized enough for your unique business needs.
benefits.retail_desc: Streamline checkout with POS, manage deep inventory, and prevent stock theft.
benefits.wholesale_desc: Full audit trails for stock movement and seamless branch management.
benefits.hardware_desc: Track accurate stock levels with barcode scanning and manage customer credit.
benefits.hospitality_desc: POS integration, expense tracking, and instant online storefront visibility.
benefits.boutiques_desc: Showcase products with images and launch your online shop in minutes.
benefits.multi_branch_desc: Centralized reporting with branch data separation for clear oversight.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.description: Join thousands of entrepreneurs using mBiz to grow their businesses.

footer.tagline: Smart Inventory & POS for Growing Businesses
